sentences.en: Channel 4's overseas buyers have foreseen the audience demand with their usual perspicacity.
sentences.cn: 四频道的海外收购者以其惯有的洞察力预见到了观众的需求。

sentences.en: He may own the perspicacity and persistence to catch and keep the most valuable thing.
sentences.cn: 他可能拥有洞察力和坚忍力,可以抓住和保有人生中最宝贵的东西.

sentences.en: It was a marvellous effort of perspicacity to discover that I did not love her.
sentences.cn: 真是费了不少的劲才发现我本来就不爱他.

sentences.en: Perspicacity includes selective code, selective comparing and selective combining.
sentences.cn: 洞察力包括选择性编码 、 选择性比较、选择性联合.

words.tran_cn: 有洞察力的；聪颖的；敏锐的
